elements.title: fiction about impact events (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that fiction about impact events (pictured) typically focuses more on the societal ramifications than on the science?

elements.title: Thora Thersner (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that after her father's death, Thora Thersner completed his work documenting Swedish buildings and landscapes?

elements.title: a 2025 musical film (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that a 2025 musical film, which topped the U.S. box office within a weekend, had its global release plan scrapped in multiple countries?

elements.title: The True History of Chocolate (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Michael D. Coe completed The True History of Chocolate to fulfill a promise he made to his dying wife?

elements.title: Michael Brennan (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that golfer Michael Brennan won in his first start as a professional on the PGA Tour?

elements.title: Girl with a Mandolin (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the titular mandolin in Picasso's Girl with a Mandolin has been attributed with "a mild autoerotic suggestion"?

elements.title: Jack Teele (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Jack Teele remained employed by the Los Angeles Rams under three different owners, six head coaches, and "umpteen different quarterbacks"?

elements.title: Foresters Music Hall (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that in his early career Charlie Chaplin was booed, heckled, and pelted with oranges and coins until he left the stage of Foresters Music Hall?

elements.title: Haru Urara (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Umamusume character Haru Urara became so popular that a website donating grass to feed her namesake racehorse crashed?

elements.title: Destination of the Month (Wikivoyage recommendations)
elements.contents:
Destination of the Month

Kowloon

One of the most densely populated cities on Earth, Hong Kong's mainland portion offers a culture less influenced by the British than the neighboring Island, plus accommodation, dining, and nightlife are generally cheaper.

elements.title: Off the Beaten Path (Wikivoyage recommendations)
elements.contents:
Off the Beaten Path

Andorra la Vella

Andorra la Vella is the capital of a quirky co-principality lodged in the mountains between Spain and France that offers great skiing, hiking, and lots of duty-free shopping.

elements.title: Featured Travel Topic (Wikivoyage recommendations)
elements.contents:
Featured Travel Topic

San Diego International Airport

The main airport to America's finest city is the busiest single runway airport in the world.
